description: This file defines a Flutter widget for an admin orders management screen, including UI components like headers, placeholders, and role-based authorization logic.

classes.name: AdminOrdersManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays an admin interface for managing orders, with role-based access control and responsive layout features.

classes.name: _NeonSectionHeader
classes.description: A stateless widget for rendering a styled section header with gradient background, icon, title, and subtitle.

classes.name: _NeonPlaceholder
classes.description: A stateless widget used as a placeholder component with neon glow styling, icon, and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the orders management screen, including authorization check, layout, and placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the neon section header widget with specified styling and content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the neon placeholder widget with icon and text.
